channel.title: 667 Loading 704 Running Problem
channel.description:
Hey guys, I downloaded a 667 loading 704 from a friend and it won't run. He said he has no idea how to fix it and I looked for something to solve it but it won't work. Can anybody help me?
The error when running the source:
[Launcher] Initing Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 19 at com.rs.utils.utils.getitemdefinitionsize(utils.java:244) at com.rs.cache.loaders.itemequipids.init(itemequipids.java:13) at com.rs.launcher.main(launcher.java:63)

item.title: 667 Loading 704 Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

[quote=“coolkid0228, post:5, topic:436845”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=539560.msg3949295#msg3949295 date=1332158227]
You’ve not followed the instructions that he told you with the cache.

  • Create a new folder called “cache” in server\data\
  • Extract the cache into server\data\cache
  • Run the source

That’ll fix it.
[/quote]

Like I said before I did that.

Add me on skype and see if you can help me?

free.graphic.designer[/quote]

Like i said before UPDATE YOUR JDK AND JRE TO VERSION 7… this server will not run without the new version

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Loading 704 Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @coolkid0228 coolkid0228
item.description:
@coolkid0228 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:4, topic:436845”]You’ve not followed the instructions that he told you with the cache.

  • Create a new folder called “cache” in server\data\
  • Extract the cache into server\data\cache
  • Run the source

That’ll fix it.[/quote]

Like I said before I did that.

Add me on skype and see if you can help me?

free.graphic.designer

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Loading 704 Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You’ve not followed the instructions that he told you with the cache.

  • Create a new folder called “cache” in server\data\
  • Extract the cache into server\data\cache
  • Run the source

That’ll fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Loading 704 Running Problem
item.dc:creator: @coolkid0228 coolkid0228
item.description:
@coolkid0228 wrote:

shabba 56:

what u have to do is extrack the cache into the server then data folder but u need to make a new folder in data called “cache” extract the cache there then run it if you still have the same problem then u need to update your jre and jdk version to 7

I did that and I already updated. Do you have a fixed one I can have?

Read full topic
